title: Mouse Logitech PRO X Superlight Gaming
description: Less than 63 grams. Advanced LIGHTSPEED wireless technology with low latency. Sub-micron accuracy with HERO 25K sensor. Eliminate all obstacles with our lightest and fastest PRO wireless mouse.

title: HyperX Alloy Elite 2
description: For gamers, streamers and multitaskers who need more control at their fingertips, HyperX Alloy Elite 2 is the keyboard for you. With dedicated media keys and a large volume wheel, this full-featured gaming keyboard is ready for everything from editing videos to watching movies.

title: Mousepad HyperX Fury S XL Speed
description: The HyperX™ FURY Professional Gaming Mouse Pad has evenly stitched, anti-wear edges that provide a smooth surface for controlled gliding. The pad is made of a high-density fabric that provides a soft-touch surface yet has a fine texture ideal for optical mouse use. Dimensions: 900mm x 420mm

title: Mouse Razer Viper V2 Pro Wireless Mercury
description: As the successor to the award-winning Razer Viper Ultimate, our latest evolution is over 20% lighter and features comprehensive upgrades for better performance. With one of the lightest wireless gaming mice ever, now there's no stopping you.

title: Mouse Logitech G502 X Plus White
description: G502 X PLUS is the latest addition to the legendary G502 range. Reinvented with our very first LIGHTFORCE hybrid switches, professional-grade LIGHTSPEED wireless technology, RGB LIGHTSYNC, HERO 25K sensor, etc.

title: Mouse Hyperx Pulsefire Haste Wireless White
description: The HyperX Pulsefire Haste wireless gaming mouse includes all the best features of the ultra-light Pulsefire Haste, plus wireless connectivity and long battery life, but adds only 2g of extra weight.

title: Mouse Logitech G603 Wireless Gaming
description: HERO is a revolutionary new optical sensor designed by Logitech G to deliver outstanding performance and up to 10 times more energy efficiency. With the HERO sensor, G603 also delivers exceptionally accurate and stable performance across the entire dpi range, with no filtering, smoothing or pixel rounding from 200 to 12,000 dpi.

title: Logitech G915 TKL Wireless Keyboard White
description: G915 TKL incorporates professional-grade LIGHTSPEED wireless technology, advanced RGB LIGHTSYNC and high-performance, low-profile mechanical switches

title: Razer Huntsman V2 Keyboard Tenkeyless Optical Gaming
description: Mid-range performance in a more agile form factor: enter the Razer BlackWidow V3 Tenkeyless. Continuing an iconic legacy, this compact gaming keyboard is armed with our world-renowned Razer™ mechanical switches and powered by Razer Chroma™ RGB, for a level of precision and customization beloved by gamers everywhere.

title: Cooler Master SK653 BK Keyboard Low Profile Bluetooth – Cherry Red
description: The SK653 hybrid wireless gaming keyboard takes a modern approach to the classic mechanical keyboard with low-profile switches housed in a sleek chassis.

title: Logitech G PRO Gaming Keyboard
description: The first Logitech G keyboard with the PRO name is designed and built to the high standards of top eSports athletes. Made for high performance, designed to win.

title: Mouse Pad Redragon Flick XL
description: The double-stitched edge significantly increases the service life and prevents the surface from fraying. High-quality fine mesh cloth allows for optimal speed and precise control while gaming. Experience silky smooth feel and ultimate comfort while surfing the web, working in the office or playing your favorite games. A comfort zone to rest your wrist.

title: Mouse Pad Logitech Powerplay
description: Continuously charge your compatible Logitech G mice: G903, G502 LIGHTSPEED, PRO X SUPERLIGHT and more. POWERPLAY is a complete solution with integrated professional-grade LIGHTSPEED wireless technology.

title: Mouse pad Razer Gigantus v2 XXL ESL Edition
description: If you're looking to play amazing games, go big with the Razer Gigantus V2. It's a soft gaming mouse pad with a textured micro-weave fabric surface, designed to level up your game with fluid movements and pixel-level precision.

title: Mouse Pad Logitech G840 XL
description: Desktop gaming mouse pad complete with space to configure your settings the way you want. Surface texture is optimized for performance for Logitech G mouse.

title: Notebook Aorus 15P Core i7-11800H/32GB/SSD PCIe 1Tb/RTX 3080Q/15,6 240Hz
description: Intel 11a Gen Core i7-11800H 2.3GHz 24MB 8 cores, memory 32 GB DDR4 3200 (2 x 16GB), storage 1 TB M.2 PCIe NVME Gen 4, video graphics Dedicated NVIDIA RTX 3080Q 8 GB GDDR6, 15.6″ FHD (1920×1080) 240Hz IPS-level 72% NTSC display

title: Notebook Asus Zenbook Pro 14 Duo UX84002ZA Core i7 4.7Ghz/16GB/1TB SSD/14.5»/2.8K Oled Touch
description: Black color. Built in aluminum, Windows 11 Home 64bit system in English, Intel Core i7 12700H 2.3GHz processor (24M Cache, up to 4.7GHz), 16GB LPDDR5, 1TB M.2 NVMe M.2 PCIe 4.0 SSD ,OLED 14.5 2.8K 2880 x 1800 120Hz 0.2ms HDR touchscreen display, Secondary Display ScreenPad Plus IPS 12.7 2880 x 864 with pen support Intel Iris X Graphics video

title: Notebook ASUS VIVOBOOK X1605ZA-MB013W I7-1255U/16Gb/512Gb PCIe/16/W11
description: Display: 16'' IPS ANTI-REFLECT, 60 Hz, 1920 x 1200 pixels, processor: INTEL CORE I7 1255U, 10 CORE (8 x Efficient 3.5 GHz / 2 x Performance 4.7 GHz), Integrated Graphics: INTEL IRIS XE, operating System: WINDOWS 11 HOME, RAM: 16 GB (8 GB DDR4 ON BOARD + 8 GB DDR4 SODIMM), solid disk: 512 GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0.

title: Notebook MSI GF63 Thin Core I5-10500H/8GB/256GB SSD/GTX 1650/15.6
description: Intel Core i5-10500H 2.5GHz processor (up to 4.5GHz with turbo), 8GB DDR4 2666MHz RAM, 256GB NVMe SSD. 15.6 Full HD (1920×1080) 60Hz IPS LCD display. NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 Max-Q video with 4GB GDDR5.

title: Notebook ASUS Laptop X515 X515JA-BR3057W i3-1005G1/8Gb/256Gb PCIe/15,6/W11
description: Operating system: Windows 11 64Bit, processor: Intel® Core™ i3-1005G1 processor; 1.2 GHz (4M cache; up to 3.4 GHz), graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics, display: 15.6″ WV, Memory: 4Gb + 4Gb (On BD), Storage: 256 GB SSD M.2 NVMe™ PCIe® 3.0

title: Trust GXT1175 Imperius XL Desktop
description: It features a large 140 x 66 cm surface area, an integrated cable management system and a mouse pad that covers the entire surface area. The XL-sized Trust Imperius gaming desk measures 140 x 66 cm for more than enough freedom of movement, even when using two monitors. With a solid steel frame and height-adjustable legs, this desk is suitable for everyone.
